72057594081706052.note: Enable Motion Sensor - we do not want motion to be reported by default. Change to Enabled if needed

72057594081707603.note: Group 1 Reports - 241 means all available sensors to be reported and we do not use multiple groups by default

72057594081707763.note: Group 1 Interval (seconds) - the interval for measurement reports. Currently unclear what this actually does when below the wake-up-interval

72057594086227971.note: Wake-up Interval - this is reported in seconds but set in minutes. By default, we set it to 4 minutes, which is the minimum for this device

72057594081706628.note: Reporting Threshold - we also want report in case of changes and not only in fixed intervals

72057594077528081.note: Alarm Level - not tampering alarms for our use-case, please

72057594081706646.note: Temperature Reporting Threshold (%) - we want these reports quite often

72057594081709201.note: Temperature Calibration - no calibration by default

72057594081706724.note: Low Temp Alarm - we are not interested in alarms

72057594081706662.note: Humidity Reporting Threshold (%) - we want these reports quite often

72057594081709217.note: Humidity Calibration - no calibration by default

72057594081706678.note: Luminance Reporting Threshold (LUX) - these should not be too low, as it would report continuously at high levels, eg in summer, without significant proportional changes

72057594081709238.note: Luminance Calibration - no calibration by default

72057594081706705.note: UV Reporting Threshold - we want these reports quite often

72057594081709249.note: UV Calibration - no calibration by default

72057594081706694.note: Battery Reporting Threshold (%) - this is rather unimportant for us but should nonetheless be reported
